TAM.description_of_public: The total addressable market includes all motorcycle owners and potential buyers of motorcycle accessories, which encompasses an estimated 10 million motorcycle owners in Europe alone, representing a significant opportunity for bundled accessory sales.
TAM.justification: The TAM was calculated based on the average spend of motorcycle owners on accessories, estimated at â‚¬50 per owner annually, multiplied by the number of motorcycle owners across Europe. Assumptions include a stable motorcycle ownership rate and consistent accessory market growth driven by increasing customization trends.

industry_example.name: Harley-Davidson
industry_example.description: Harley-Davidson targets a large market of motorcycle owners with a wide range of custom accessories and parts, effectively tapping into the TAM by offering personalized solutions.

SAM.description_of_public: The serviceable available market includes motorcycle owners who actively seek accessories and are reachable through BMW's existing dealer network, estimated at 3 million owners across Europe.
SAM.justification: SAM represents approximately 30% of the TAM, focusing on owners of BMW motorcycles, who are more likely to purchase tailored accessory bundles. Growth estimates consider an increase in customer awareness and demand for bundled products.

industry_example.name: BMW Motorrad
industry_example.description: BMW Motorrad has a targeted approach to motorcycle accessories, utilizing its dealer network to reach a substantial portion of active motorcycle users looking for high-quality parts.

SOM.description_of_public: The serviceable obtainable market consists of customers who can realistically be captured through effective marketing and streamlined ordering processes, estimated at 600,000 owners in the initial years.
SOM.justification: SOM is calculated as 20% of SAM, factoring in initial market penetration and growth through enhanced dealer engagement and customer satisfaction. Assumptions include effective implementation of the bundle strategy and increased dealer sales efficiency.

industry_example.name: Ducati
industry_example.description: Ducati successfully captures market share by offering curated accessory packages, focusing on customer experience and leveraging their dealer network for promotions.
